description: This object contains information about the server representation in ROS 2.

bindingVersion.description: The version of this binding. If omitted, 'latest' MUST be assumed.

domainId.description: All ROS 2 nodes use domain ID 0 by default. To prevent interference between different groups of computers running ROS 2 on the same network, a group can be set with a unique domain ID.

rmwImplementation.description: Specifies the ROS 2 middleware implementation to be used. This determines the underlying middleware implementation that handles communication.
